query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(riskLevel) as has_risk,
  COUNT(governancePath) as has_governance,
  COUNT(missionAlignmentScore) as has_mission_score,
  COUNT(missionAlignmentReasoning) as has_mission_reasoning,
  COUNT(riskReasoning) as has_risk_reasoning
FROM initiatives;
